title: Tool of the Month - Wake Up Cry
content: Our Tool of the Month is an Android alarm clock app called Wake Up Cry. Basically, it is a unique alarm that forces you to wake up. How? With baby sounds – because no one ignores a baby! Designed with intuitive user interface and free for download, this app will wake you up instantly. Read the whole review to find out everything about the app. What is so special about this app? Developed for android users as an alarm app which is offering users to easily, instantly and efficiently wake up and get up on time every time they use it. On the app, users need to simply choose the time and the mode that suits them the most. Unique and practical, with this app users will wake up with the sounds of a baby and they will be forced to get up to take care of the baby in order to turn off the alarm clock. No more ignoring alarms, with this app, users will always get up on time without problems. What are the best features offered? The Wake Up Cry for its users has to offer very practical and efficient features that will force them to wake up and get up on time just with the sounds of a baby. Users on this app need to only set the time when they want to wake up and then just choose the baby mode they like the most. With the first mode, the mode of a crying baby users are required to wake up with a bolder approach and they are forced to get up to take care of the baby so the alarm goes off. With the second mode, the mode of a happy baby users are required to wake up with a gentler approach and get up to give the baby a kiss so the alarm goes off as well. This app is certainly helping users to wake up instantly and never get late or sleep in again, offering them to choose the baby sounds they like the most to wake them up. Download the app for free on Google Play now to set your alarm and get up on time with sounds of a baby! Google Play Download Link: Wake Up Cry Tweet Pin It Buffer
